posts.post_title: WTB: Toronto players from C46 / Imperial Tobacco.
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Richard
Greetings Folks,

   My latest endeavour is to assemble a C46 'subset' of Toronto players.  I need quite a few, and would prefer RAW cards.  I would also consider lower grade PSA/SGC/etc as well.

Please email scans and asking prices to richard@richardarmstrong.ca

Thanks!!

Richard.

Update to wantlist.  Still looking for the following:

2Jim McGinley
27Joe Kelley
28Benny Meyers
33John Lush
36Edward Phelps
67Joseph Delehanty
70Edward Fitzpatrick
83Robert Shaw
